help.title: Help & Support
help.description: Need assistance with your claim or have questions about our services? Reach out to our team.

contact.title: Contact Support
contact.description: Our team is available Monday to Friday, 9:00 - 17:00.

q1.question: How long does a claim take?

q2.question: What documents do I need?
q2.answer: Proof of purchase, photos of damage, and incident report.

legal.consumerRightsDesc: Learn about your rights under current consumer protection laws.
